entry.title: The Black Sheep's Reckoning
entry.summary:
Author: Noot_Noot_34

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,223Chapters: 9/26Kudos: 0

Summary: Jason Todd’s life is already complicated — smugglers in the Narrows, Bat‑Family breathing down his neck, and scars that never let him forget the Joker. Then Vice shows up: sharp knives, sharper banter, and zero respect for boundaries. What follows is chaos in every flavor — rooftop silences, bad puns in the cave, coded ledgers, collapsing scaffolds, and Joker’s laughter bleeding back into Gotham. Somewhere between mistrust and survival, Jason has to figure out if he’s still the reckless Red Hood… or something else entirely. And through it all, Gotham keeps bleeding — with Jason and you tangled in the middle, fighting side‑by‑side, even when neither of them is sure what that really means...

entry.title: futile devices
entry.summary:
Author: al_lion_e

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,924Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 103

Summary: “That’s gonna get infected.” Comes a voice from down the alley, cold and disinterested. You freeze, and look up. “Oh.” “I mean,” says a man in a recognizable red helmet, “unless you disinfect it. Gothams dumpsters carry germs scientists haven’t even discovered.” He's leaning against the brick wall to your right near the entrance of the alley, his broad, intimidating figure literally blotting out the lights beyond. It's strange to see him so close up- in person, not in blurry photographs in magazines, or on the news.   Or: Encounters.

entry.title: People Aren't Good
entry.summary:
Author: Miss_nightshade

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,685Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 103

Summary: Hecate has spent her life tucked into the bruised edges of Gotham’s Narrows, pretending to be a small, harmless girl with nothing worth noticing. It’s a fragile lie, but it holds. She goes to school. She walks home alone. She returns to a house that feels older than she is, a place that hums with magic she refuses to touch. She keeps her power buried. She ignores the ancient voices whispering inside her. She does everything she can to stay unseen. And for years, it works. Until the night it doesn’t.

entry.title: Apartment 3B
entry.summary:
Author: ElaineInABox

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,769Chapters: 16/20Kudos: 775

Summary: You weren’t looking for love, just somewhere cheap, quiet, and safe enough to get you through the semester. Jason Todd wasn’t looking for company, just a roommate who wouldn’t ask questions about why he came home at two AM bloody and bruised.But in a cramped apartment in Crime Alley, between burnt coffee, leaky ceilings, and the soft hum of the city that never sleeps, the silence between you starts to change. What begins as survival becomes something quieter, steadier—something that almost feels like home.

entry.title: Baby’s First Creature-Feature
entry.summary:
Author: TheGoldenPath

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,283Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 56

Summary: She’s reading to him, a generator manual that looks well read. The pages are yellow and water stained around her long fingers. His vision lazily trails from the book to his bloodied sheets and back to the stranger. Is he hallucinating a comforting presence to make his reality less burdensome? When had his visions ever been pleasant?A pretty girl to sit by his bedside and comfort him in his death. It reminds him of the soft moments of peace in his childhood that he held onto with a white knuckled grip. It reminds him of the few moments his mother felt like a mother. He tries to reach out and touch her hand, just to see if she’s a fantasy meant to remind him of everything he never fully had only for the pain to jolt up his entire abdomen. That works too. He manages to stifle the pained groan that wants to shoot out from the simple motion.   Lightly inspired by the myth of Circe in the odyssey. (Lightly with some hellboy dashed in for good measure)
